text: frddna musaa 'iilaa amh; kay tqrr eaynuha bh, wwfyna 'iilayha balwed; 'iidh raje 'iilayha slymana min qutil frewn, wala thzn ealaa fraqh, walitaelam 'ana waed allah haqun fima waeadaha min rddih 'iilayha wjelh min almrslyn. 'iina allah la yukhlif wedh, wlkn 'akthar almushrikin la yaelamun 'ana waed allah hq
